Builder class to simplify creating a SortedMap whose keys contains the tokens of each StandardToken.
SingleBracketPomTokenParserFactory.DirectoryPrefixEnricher - Class in se.jguru.nazgul.core.quickstart.api.generator.parser
Class which defines whether or not the name of the Project should be added as a prefix to SoftwareComponent directories when their names are synthesized.
SingleBracketPomTokenParserFactory.MavenVersionEnricher - Class in se.jguru.nazgul.core.quickstart.api.generator.parser
Either of two Maven versions are generally required to tokenize the <parent> element within a POM.
SingleBracketPomTokenParserFactory.PrefixEnricher - Class in se.jguru.nazgul.core.quickstart.api.generator.parser
BuilderStep which adds the prefix of Maven GroupIDs for a relative path within a directory.
SingleBracketPomTokenParserFactory.RelativePathEnricher - Class in se.jguru.nazgul.core.quickstart.api.generator.parser
Class which adds the relative path to a SoftwareComponent, as well as temporary pomTokens SOFTWARE_COMPONENT_RELATIVE_PATH and SOFTWARE_COMPONENT_NAME.
SingleBracketPomTokenParserFactory.SuffixEnricher - Class in se.jguru.nazgul.core.quickstart.api.generator.parser
Builder step which can add a project suffix, for project types which requires it (and no project suffix for project types that requires none).

The pomTokens key holding the relative name of the SoftwareComponent containing the active Maven project.

SoftwareComponentPart - Enum in se.jguru.nazgul.core.quickstart.api.generator

StructureNavigator - Interface in se.jguru.nazgul.core.quickstart.api
Specification for how to navigate in a File system containing a Project, as well as how to extract data from the file system as required by the Project.
